“apawathwi wadala garu maduluwawe sobhitha himiyange karyaya idiriyatath elesama karagena yama ape abhiprayayi.janapathithumani, ma me pawasannata yana deyin oba adhairyayata pathnoweyayi ma sithanawa.garu sobhitha himiyange nayakathwaya yatathe meheyawunu wyaparaye pihiten oba podu apekshakaya lesa janapathiwaranayata idiripathwela jayagrahanaya kala.eyin passe, ekthara samithiyaka jeyashta samajikayan pirisak garu sobhitha himiyanwa hamuwannata paminiya.rotiya pichcheyi da?

janadhipathiwaraya kisima witeka nila adumen sarasi sitina kisidu niladhariyekuta thamanta wada namaskara kirimata ida nodena athara siya samawayas karya mandala samajikayinata saha deshapalana niyojithayinta kisi witekath ee sandaha ida nodena bawa janadhipathiwarayata samipa aaranchi marga apa samaga prakasha kala.

edina owun pamina sitiye lasantha ghathanayata awashya siyalu katayuthu sudanam karagenaya.
bas eke ada maha kalabalayak.

ithama agana kalochitha lipiyak, pudgala kendriya nowi, samasthaya thula oba kara athi pahadili kirima ithama artha sampannayi.adala amathi waraya danata bhawitha karana wahanaya wenath amathyanshayak sathunam, eya amathya warayekuge bhawithayata sudusu thakshanika ha pahasukam walin yuktha nam, adala wahanaya himi amathyanshaye amati warayage bhawithaya sandaha da sudusu wahana athinam, ehi lekam warayekuta ho anekekutath mewani wahanayaka yame aashawak nisa eya illuwa wannatada hakiya.rajaya matha mewani wiyadam upadinne ekinekage pudagalika aashawan sathapawimata misa , owun pawathina rajaye pakshikayinwa thaba ganime araminin misa oba kiyana aakarayen rajya yanthranaya niwaradiwa pawathwa ganime chethanawen nowna waga aarthika widyawa ho deshapalanaya gana abamal renuwaka danimak nathi game bayiya (deshapalana bayiyan nowe ) pawa danna karanayaki.
eheth thisaru eeta dadi lesa wirodhaya dakwayi.age akamaththa nothakama hektar da ayata aadaraya payi.
